alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 11:58AM PST until November 20 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 3 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the High Wind Warning, northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Malibu Coast and Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area.5 * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 1 AM PST Monday. For the High Wind Warning, from 1 AM to 3 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Malibu Coast
